settings.title: DO YOU OFFER INTEREST-FREE FINANCE? IF SO WHAT ARE THE AVAILABLE INTEREST FREE TERMS?
settings.answer:
Yes, we do. We use GE Money, Certegy Ezi-Pay and zipPay. Our interest-free terms range from 3 months to 24 months, depending on the equipment purchased and the purchase amounts. Please speak to your local Elite Fitness Equipment store to see the best available options for you.

*We reserve the right to not offer finance on some products.

settings.title: HOW MUCH DOES IT COST FOR SHIPPING?
settings.answer: There is a shipping calculator on 99% of our items – simply enter your postcode for a quote on a single product. If you wish to receive a freight quote for multiple products, simply add all the products to your cart and use the shipping calculator at the checkout.

settings.title: HOW LONG DOES IT TAKE FOR MY ORDER TO ARRIVE?
settings.answer:
Please allow 2 to 7 business days* from the time we receive your payment. The actual time in transit depends on where the item is being sent from and where it is going. Most of the East Coast and Adelaide is usually 1-2 days for delivery time. Perth, Darwin and Tasmania are usually 4-8 days depending on the exact location. Once your order has been dispatched, the freight company’s computer system will send you an automated email with all the information that you need. Once you have this information if you have any queries regarding the delivery time you are best off contacting the freight companies customer service directly.

*Special orders or items that are not in stock can take up to 14 business days. Please contact us for more information.

settings.title: DO YOU OFFER INSTALLATION OF MY GYM EQUIPMENT?
settings.answer: Yes we do. Contact your nearest Elite Fitness store to discuss your specific requirements and the costs for your installation.

settings.title: Can I get my product personalized?
settings.answer: It depends on the creator and the product. All options are outlined on the product page, so look out for customization options there.

settings.contact_info_text: If we still haven't answered your question, you can contact us below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
